segments.text: Where did you work in the past ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For the past 5 years , I have been in an Ericsson ( China ) Communication Co , Ltd .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's your title in the company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My title was Project Manager . There were almost 100 people under my supervision .
segments.speaker: S2
